> <OLD>
>
> "You need to rest, Tucson"replied dryly perceptor"Others can stay with
> Rodimus"

As Santon ran scanners over Tuscon, Bump and Legacy continued to watch
Rodimus, thier optics bright with tension. First the scanner beeped
once and then a second time and then with an authoratative beep it
began a steady pulse as Rodimus' optics flickered once and then glowed
brightly, "NOOO!!" he said as he feebly tried to get himself off the
table. "You cannot have me, Never!"

Then he paused as he looked up at Legacy and then over at Bump, the
two technicians who had been working on him all this time. "Where . .
. where am I?" he said, for a moment looking lost until he looked
around and saw the operating room, and then Tuscon. Then he sat up,
his returning strength surpring even Legacy who, along with Bump had
been trying to ease him back onto the table. "Where is Nightlight?" He
looked around frantcally, "and Elita???"

(TAG)

Preston
